#include <iostream>
     class A
     {
     public:
       A() : m_i(0) { }
     protected:
       int m_i;
     };
     class B
     {
     public:
        B() : m_d(0.0) { }
     protected:
        double m_d;
     };
     class C
          : public A
           , public B
     {
      public:
          C() : m_c('a') { }
      private:
          char m_c;
      };
      int main()
      {
        C c;
        A *pa = &c;
        B *pb = &c;
        const int x = (pa == &c) ? 1 : 2;
        const int y = (pb == &c) ? 3 : 4;
        const int z = (reinterpret_cast<char*>(pa) ==   reinterpret_cast<char*>(pb)) ? 5 : 6;
        std::cout << x << y << z << std::endl;
        return 0;
      }
